Uses of Class
view.View

  • Packages that use View 
    Package Description
    controller
    This package contains the controller of the application.
    It contains everything that is needed to run the application, the logic behind the program.
    There are various classes that are called classNameManager.java, these classes have a specific task to do (e.g.

    • Uses of View in controller

      Fields in controller declared as View 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private View DailyManager.view 
      private View Controller.view 
      Methods in controller with parameters of type View 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void Controller.initView(View view)
      This method initialize the view:
      Timer initialization, it puts the string "00:00:00" on the timer Event listener for the text area for the task description Event listener for the start button Event listener for the stop button Event listener for the report generation button Initialization of the Daily (list of tasks of today)
      private void Controller.startClock(View view)
      This method initialize the "clock" which is the timer that counts the time of a task.
      private void Controller.startNow(View view)
      This method initialize the "now" clock which is just a simple clock that shows the output of now.
      Constructors in controller with parameters of type View 
      Constructor and Description
      Controller(java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle, View view)
      ResourceBundle is used for the translations of the program.
      View is used to control everything related to the UI of the program.
      DailyManager(View view)
